meanings.definition: The act of officiating a sports game as an umpire.
meanings.sent1: During the baseball game, the umpiring was fair and consistent.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys umpiring because it allows her to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The umpiring at the soccer match was so bad, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail in umpiring is like a hawk watching over its prey.
meanings.sent5: The umpiring skills of the referee were so sharp, it was like a laser beam cutting through the game.

meanings.definition: The practice or profession of being an umpire.
meanings.sent1: His dream job is to work in umpiring and be part of the game.
meanings.sent2: Umpiring requires a lot of training and knowledge of the rules.
meanings.sent3: She decided to pursue a career in umpiring after falling in love with the sport.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, umpiring is like being the judge in a courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The dedication and passion for umpiring shown by the officials is truly inspiring.
